description: This file defines the NotesProvider class which manages state and operations related to notes in a Flutter application, including initializing preferences, filtering, creating, updating, deleting, and toggling view modes for notes.

classes.name: NotesProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier-based provider class managing note data, preferences, and operations such as CRUD and view mode toggling.

methods.name: initialize
methods.description: Initializes the provider, loading view mode from shared preferences and fetching notes.

methods.name: refresh
methods.description: Fetches all notes from the repository and updates internal state.

methods.name: createNote
methods.description: Creates a new note with specified title, content, and optional pinned status.

methods.name: updateNote
methods.description: Updates an existing note via the repository.

methods.name: deleteNote
methods.description: Deletes a note by its ID.

methods.name: togglePinned
methods.description: Toggles the pinned status of a note.

methods.name: setSearchQuery
methods.description: Sets the search query string for filtering notes.

methods.name: toggleViewMode
methods.description: Switches between grid and list view modes and saves preference.
